: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw continued to try and seperate them as they both mouthed off at him. He looked at KitKat.
SharpClaw: Actually I was thinking about aiding you in this fight, if I couldn't stop it.
SharpClaw brings his attention to Perceptor.
SharpClaw: I dont think she needs to apologize for anything. Your attitude, Perceptor, gets you into trouble!
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Perceptor.

"she baguns all, she have to apologize..."snarled annoyed the 
male
